title: Landing Page hero Get Started opens Google Form in new tab

requirements.summary: Change the Landing Page hero “Get Started” button to open the provided Google Form URL in a new tab and stop triggering the Internet Identity login/loading state.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Landing Page hero section, clicking/tapping the button labeled “Get Started” opens https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfPd7k1jiJqI71faIie9aYOmeScqdQ98jTcIFtYoJK9AJvHig/viewform?usp=preview
The Google Form opens in a new tab/window (i.e., does not navigate away from the app tab)
Clicking “Get Started” no longer initiates the Internet Identity login flow or shows the “Loading...” state for that button

file_operations.description: In the hero section only, replace the current Get Started onClick handler (which calls Internet Identity login) with logic that opens the provided Google Form URL in a new browser tab/window (e.g., window.open with noopener/noreferrer, or an anchor-like rendering). Ensure this hero button no longer uses isLoggingIn to disable itself or render the “Loading...” label. Keep the existing “Find Jobs” and “Hire Talent” buttons and their login flows unchanged.
